title: Can Duolingo Teach You Spanish?
Reminder to check what your previous salaries were, adjusted for inflation
text:
https://www.bls.gov/data/inflation_calculator.htm

You might be surprised to find out that you used to make more in the past.

200K in Jan 2020 would be 230K in Oct 2022, for example.

It may be worthwhile to keep in mind your previous salaries, adjusted for inflation, when negotiating compensation for new roles.

(And then of course, if you've increased your skills, experience, training, and so on since then, likely it would be reasonable to try to get an increase.)

Ask HN: How big of a step forward is ChatGPT?
text: I, like so many others have been very impressed by ChatGPT. I'm a software engineer who has some understanding of deep learning, but my day to day work is far outside of the AI field. So I'm not up to date on the current state of chat bots, speech synthesis, etc. I'm wondering how big of a step forward or breakthrough ChatGPT is compared to the state of the art from a year or a few months ago?
